abstract: The JPMorgan Chase vice chairman and key lieutenant to the firm’s chief, Jamie Dimon, will leave early next year, according to an internal memorandum obtained by DealBook.
snippet: The JPMorgan Chase vice chairman and key lieutenant to the firm’s chief, Jamie Dimon, will leave early next year, according to an internal memorandum obtained by DealBook.
lead_paragraph: Steven D. Black, vice chairman of JPMorgan Chase and a top lieutenant of the firm’s chief executive, Jamie Dimon, will leave early next year, according to an internal memorandum obtained by DealBook.

headline.main: Black, JPMorgan’s Vice Chairman, to Leave in 2011
